summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Digital Health Diary application. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all CRUD operations working. Frontend is 90% functional with minor UI interaction issues in medication form dropdown.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection blocked by modal overlay - prevents clicking dropdown options

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions when no data available

passed_tests: User registration with name, email, password
User login with email and password
Dashboard showing stats (total records, active medications, latest vitals)
Add vitals form - all fields working and saving data
Analytics endpoints for stats and trends
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix medication form dropdown interaction issue - modal overlay is blocking dropdown option selection. Also address console warnings for chart dimensions and add dialog descriptions for accessibility.
